maked_by: This project is made by Wraith.
for_more_info: For more info, check the About page
joyride.encoded: You can enter the text you want to encrypt here or view the text you have decrypted.
joyride.decoded: You can enter the text you want to decrypt here or view the text you have encrypted.
joyride.key: You can view the key of the text you have encrypted here or enter the key of the text you want to decrypt.
joyride.ike: You can perform the same encryption operation without a key here.
joyride.changelog: You can view the changelog here.
joyride.language: You can change your language here.
joyride.about: You can get information about this application here.
joyride.theme: You can change the theme here.
